concept.title: Best practices for PDF customization plug-ins
concept.shortdesc: Adhering to certain development practices will properly isolate your code from that of the DITA Open Toolkit (DIT-OT). This will make it easier to you to upgrade to new versions of the DITA-OT when they are released.

ul.li: Never modify any of the DITA-OT code.Set the permissions on the org.dita.pdf2 directory to read-only, to ensure that you do not accidentally modify the files within as you develop your customized plug-in.
Never copy entire DITA-OT files into your customization plug-in. Instead, copy only the attribute sets and templates that you need to override.
Maintain a change log and comment your changes.
Upgrade your customization plug-in to new versions of the DITA-OT regularly. Do not wait through several major releases before upgrading.
